about_the_game:
Have you ever thought about how to play the traditional maze on paper? Have you ever tried folding the paper? This is my boring idea in class when I was a child. Now it has become a reality! You can go to the other side of the paper maze by folding the paper. You can play random levels, or make levels and upload them to the creative workshop! I hope it reminds you of the fun of childhood
-moving target
-Find the right path to the end point

As you can see, the graphics of this game are not very beautiful, and there is no beautiful music, but hopefully you can enjoy the gameplay. I will work hard to maintain this game and add more new features, I hope you all have a good time!

Game communication QQ group：940964713

People with ability are welcome to contact me,improve the game together.
email：2686102755@qq.com

Have you ever thought about how to play the traditional maze on paper? Have you ever tried folding the paper? This is my boring idea in class when I was a child. Now it has become a reality! You can go to the other side of the paper maze by folding the paper. You can play random levels, or make levels and upload them to the creative workshop! I hope it reminds you of the fun of childhood

As you can see, the graphics of this game are not very beautiful, and there is no beautiful music, but hopefully you can enjoy the gameplay. I will work hard to maintain this game and add more new features, I hope you all have a good time!

name: folding maze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: intel i3-8100
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This game's target is folding paper to explore the maze,you need use WASD to move,and use the left mouse button to fold the map, right mouse button unfold the map,Press the space to flip.
